nodes.text: A Barabel settlement located on the southern continent of the planet Abraxin suffered from what the locals believed to be the fabled Blight of Barabel. The town was populated by members of the Barabel species, and contained an eatery that sold alcoholic beverages, which included a local beer as well as Abraxin Brandy.
The Barabel settlement was mentioned in the 2012 novel Darth Plagueis, written by James Luceno.
